title: Harrods dept store font
content:
Can anyone help me id the Harrods dept store font please?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311141527im_/http:/typophile.com/files/harrods_6099.jpg)
author: margiedaniel

comments.content:
It's not a font, but a custom-lettered logo.

That said, the closest match is probably this, which may in fact be partly inspired by the Harrods logo: [http://www.haroldsfonts.com/famouslabel.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311141527/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/famouslabel.html "http://www.haroldsfonts.com/famouslabel.html")

Cheers,

T

Thanks so much, it's pretty darn close.

margie
